original_title: Backyard Gore: The Short Films of Gore Filth
overview: Take a trip with Gore Filth to his backyard of blood in this compilation of his trashy shot on video shorts. All presented here for the first time together completely UNCENSORED and UNCUT! Backyard Gore Torture, Genital Gore Birth Mutilation, Undead Gore Torturer, and Day Of The Blood Witch. Warning, the following feature contains multiple scenes of graphic violence and gore. If you have a heart condition or are easily offended please do not watch this movie. This one is strictly for true lovers of trash cinema only!
title: Backyard Gore: The Short Films of Gore Filth
